entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
